organic.title: Patch Cards and Download Chips | Mega Man Battle ...
organic.snippet: Press on the MegaMan screen to open the Download Chip and Patch Card screen. Select and confirm the desired Download Chip to acquire the shown Chip.

organic.title: Link a platform account to your CAPCOM ID in-game
organic.snippet: Guide for linking/pairing your account from a game screen. We will explain how to link/pair your CAPCOM ID with your Platform Account from a game screen.

organic.title: Download Chips (MMBN 3) | Mega Man Battle Network ...
organic.snippet: Press on the MegaMan screen to open the Download Chip screen. Select and confirm the Chip that you would like and it will be sent to your Pack.

organic.title: Cross-platform Play
organic.snippet: This game supports cross-platform multiplayer. Cross-platform play can be turned on or off via the Cross-platform Play setting in the Options menu.
